title: New: Lostboycrow – C’est La Vie
content:
There are few around at the moment who can nail an upbeat melody in the same manner that LA’s Lostboycrow can.

In truth, his latest track, C’est La Vie, could quite easily be a cut from the forthcoming Years & Years album; it’s got the same summer feel-good factor. Check it out below.

Follow our Spotify On Repeat playlist for a selection of the current hottest tracks.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
